Python Docs Transifex Translations documentation¶

Scripts and procedures for maintaining Python documentation translation infrastructure under python-doc organization in Transifex.

Source strings are updated using continuous integration workflow under .github/workflows. Details:

  • Run weekly

  • Run for releases in beta, release candidate, stable, bugfixes and security-fixes status; alpha or EOL are excluded;

  • It DOES NOT store translations to be used by the published documentation;

See docs directory for more information on this project maintenance.

See Translating in Python Developer’s Guide for more information.

Contents:

  • Guidance for New Contributors to Python Documentation Translation on Transifex
    • Getting Started with Python Documentation Translation
    • Geting to Know Transifex
    • Transifex Does Not Update docs.python.org
    • Projects within python-doc
    • The Latest Version for Translation
    • Translate the Latest Version
    • Placeholders
    • Final words
    • See also
  • Commands for maintaining language repository
    • Clone CPython repository
    • Install requirements
    • Updating the translations
    • Commit and push translation changes
    • Build translated documentation
    • Viewing the documentation in a web browser
    • Linting the translation files
    • Merging translations into another branch
  • Placeholders
    • Get a list of potential placeholders
    • Current Custom Placeholders
